pages.index: Titanium Zone – Your top-class gym About Us Trainer Hall Contacts Become the Best Version of Yourself: Fitness Complex Subscriptions To learn more About Welcome to our gym! We are a team of professionals who are passionate about fitness and taking care of your health. Our gym has everything you need to achieve your fitness goals and improve your overall well-being. Our mission is to help every client become the best version of themselves. No matter your fitness level, age or goals, our professional staff will be there to offer personalized attention and set you on the right path to achieving results. Our gym features state-of-the-art, high-quality equipment, a variety of group classes led by experienced instructors, and personal training tailored to your needs. We create a friendly and supportive atmosphere where everyone feels comfortable and motivated. Here you will find not only a training space, but also a community of like-minded people ready to support you at every stage of your path to success. Join our gym today and start your journey to a healthier lifestyle and better fitness! Subscription We offer a wide variety of memberships designed to fit our customers' varied needs and schedules. Whether you're a busy professional, parent or student, we have the perfect membership for you. Our memberships are designed to fit your lifestyle and fitness goals. We offer single visit passes, monthly plans, and annual subscriptions so you can choose the option that best suits your schedule and budget. No matter your fitness level or fitness experience, we have a membership to help you achieve your goals. Our coaches and instructors are ready to help you create a personalized training plan that suits your needs and desires. 1 month from 9.00 to 18.00 price: 2$ 1 month (group) from 9.00 to 18.00 price: 3$ 3 month from 9.00 to 18.00 price: 5$ 6 month from 9.00 to 18.00 price: 14$ 12 month from 9.00 to 18.00 price: 30$ For detailed information, fill out the form and our specialist will contact you Connect with us Trainers We are an energetic and highly trained team of fitness professionals committed to helping our clients achieve their healthy goals and improve their quality of life. Our team of experienced and positive instructors specializes in various aspects of health and fitness to offer varied and personalized training programs for all our clients. We believe in providing an individual approach to each client, taking into account their unique needs and goals to create a program that is right for them. Our goal is to inspire, motivate and support our clients at every step of their health and fitness journey. Olivia Bennett Ethan Johnson Liam Anderson Hall Our fitness room offers a variety of training areas designed to suit the needs of each client. Here you will find modern equipment for strength training, a cardio zone with advanced exercise equipment, a functional zone for a variety of exercises and much more. We provide our clients with the most modern and high-quality equipment for effective training. Whether your goal is to strengthen muscles, burn calories or improve endurance, we have everything you need to successfully achieve your fitness goals. We have created a cozy and friendly atmosphere where everyone feels comfortable and welcome. We strive to ensure that your workout is not only effective, but also enjoyable. Here you will find motivation, inspiration and support every step of your health and fitness journey. Contacts In order to receive all the necessary information and assistance in choosing the right subscription, we ask you to fill out the form below. Our specialist will contact you shortly to discuss your needs, preferences and goals, and offer the best subscription option for you. Our goal is to provide you with the best choice that will meet your requirements and help you achieve the results you want. Feel free to ask any questions - we are here to help you! Office address: S-2, First & Second Floor, Market, Green Park, New Delhi, Delhi 110016, India Phone number: +91 98765 43210 E-mail address: titaniumzona@gmail.com I accept the Privacy Policy Send About Us Subscription Trainer Hall Privacy Policy
pages.privacy-policy: Titanium Zone - Privacy Policy Privacy Policy Introduction/ YOUR PRIVACY IS OUR CONCERN Titanium Zone has created this privacy statement in order to demonstrate our firm's commitment to privacy. Electronic Communications Communications from Titanium Zone may transmit information that is confidential and privileged information of Titanium Zon The information contained in the communications is intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom it is addressed and others authorized to receive it.Unless you are the intended addressee, any disclosure, copying, distribution or action taken relying on the contents is prohibited and may be unlawful. If you have received such communications in error, please advise the sender by reply e-mail and/or telephone and destroy this communication immediately. This communication may contain confidential or legally privileged information. If you have received this communication in error, or if you or your employer does not consent to email messages of this kind, please notify us immediately by responding to this email and then delete it from your system. No liability is accepted for any harm that may be caused to your systems or data by this message. Information We Collect When you enter this Web site, information is gathered from your Internet browser. This information may include your IP address (which allows us to determine the identity of your Internet Service Provider), your operating system and the type of browser software that you are using to access the Web sit We use your IP address to help diagnose problems with our server and/or to administer our Web sit This gives us an idea of which parts of our site users are visiting. We do not link IP address to anything personally identifiable This means that a user’s session will be tracked, but the user will be anonymous. This information allows us to upgrade the Web site as necessary to optimize its efficiency. All information obtained from your browser is anonymous, and no personal information is ever transmitted to us in this manner. Use of Cookies We may use cookies to collect information about how you use our Web sit A “Cookie” is a piece of data that a website can send to your browser, which may then be stored on your computer as a tag that identifies your computer. While cookies are often only used to measure website usage and effectiveness and to allow for ease of navigation or use and as such, are not associated with any personal information, they are also used at times to personalize a known visitor's experience to a website by being associated with profile information or user preferences. A “cookie” is a small text file that a Web site can place on your computer’s hard drive in order, for example, to retain your preferences and/or registration information for your next visit to that Website The cookie transmits this information back to that Website’s operator. You can choose not to receive a cookie file by enabling your Web browser to refuse cookies or prompt you before accepting a cookie. Note that refusing to accept cookies may impact the performance of our Web sit However, at no time is sensitive information, such as your name, address or registration information, stored in a cookie. Personal Information At this time, you are not required to provide us with personal information in order to access our Website However, certain portions of our Website are “registration-required" pages that require you to submit personal information before we grant you access. Such information includes your name, address, e-mail address and phone number. Such information is also necessary if you are uploading or downloading software from our Web sit Our site's registration form requires you to give us contact information like your name and email address. We use this contact information from the registration form to send you information about our company. Such messages may include special timely announcements regarding our products and services. Users may opt-out of receiving future mailings by choosing the unsubscribe option in the registration form. Sharing of Personal Information We may share the personal information you disclose to us on our Website within our company. We may limit access to such information to authorized individuals. However, we may also disclose such information to affiliated and unaffiliated third parties who work with us on marketing, product development, service enhancement and other similar matters. You consent to let us collect, hold, use and disclose your information including Email ID and Phone Number for advertising and marketing purpose which may include sending information about our services through calling and emails that we consider may be of interest to you. Unsolicited E-Mail Should you voluntarily provide your personal information to us, you may receive periodic e-mail messages from us. Such messages may include special timely announcements regarding our products and services. Security Precautions This site has security measures in place to protect the loss, misuse, and/or alteration of information under our control. The data resides behind a firewall, with access restricted to authorized Titanium Zone personnel. Where appropriate, we may employ firewalls, encryption technology, user authentication systems and access control mechanisms to control access to our systems and dat However, you should exercise discretion with respect to the submission of any personal or financial information to our Web sit Transmitting information via the Internet is never completely secure and, therefore, any information submitted may be intercepted, collected, used or disclosed by others. Links to Other Web Sites This site contains links to other sites. Titanium Zone is not responsible for the privacy practices or the content of such Web sites. All links to Web sites not part of our company are made without any representations or warranties relating to the integrity, security or legitimacy of such Websites. Our privacy policy cannot and does not apply to external websites and once you leave our Web site, you are subject to that website’s privacy policies and procedures. You should be certain to consult each external Website’s own privacy policy before providing personally identifiable information. If you have concerns about any linked Website, we invite you to contact us. We do not endorse or make any representations about third-party websites. The personal data you choose to provide to or that is collected by these third parties, including any social media websites featured on our website, is not covered by the Titanium Zone Privacy Policy. We encourage you to review the privacy policy of any website before submitting your personal information. We may also provide social media features on our website that enable you to share Titanium Zone information with your social networks and to interact with Titanium Zone on various social media sites. Your use of these features may result in the collection or sharing of information about you, depending on the feature. We encourage you to review the privacy policies and settings on the social media sites with which you interact to make sure you understand the information that could be shared by those sites. Anti-Spam policy Titanium Zone recognizes the receipt, transmission or distribution of spam emails (i. unsolicited bulk emails) as a major concern and has taken reasonable measures to minimize the transmission and effect of spam emails in our computing environment. All emails received by Titanium Zone are subject to spam check. Any email identified as spam will be rejected with sufficient information to the sender for taking necessary action. With this measure, along with other technical spam reduction measures, hopes to minimize the effect of spam emails. Titanium Zone reserves the right to reject and/or report any suspicious spam emails, to the authorities concerned, for necessary action. Childrens We will not solicit, collect or maintain personal information from children under the age of 18. Children (persons under the age of 18) are not eligible to use the Web site unsupervised and we ask that children do not submit any personal information to us. Terms of Use Users/members are requested to refer to Disclaimer displayed separately on the relevant page(s) of this Website. Your usage of this Website shall be construed and deemed as an acceptance of these Terms of Use and Disclaimer displayed on relevant pages and amended from time to tim It is also understood that your acceptance of the Disclaimer will amount to a waiver by you in respect of any claims that you may have against Titanium Zone arising from the content posted herein, your usage of this Website or interaction with any other User/Member, backend team member, room editor, and mentor associated with this Website. By accessing and browsing our Web site, you also accept the Terms of Use / Terms & Conditions of our Website. Nothing in this privacy policy limits or qualifies either the Terms of Use or any “click-wrap” agreement on this Web site, and the terms and conditions of the Terms of Use and any “click-wrap” agreement should be reviewed by you in their entirety. Effective Date This Private Policy is effective as of 1st May 2020 and it supersedes all existing policies on the subject matter. Changes We reserve the right to change this privacy policy at any time by posting a modified version on our Web sit We will not reduce your rights under this Privacy Policy without your explicit consent. We will post any privacy policy changes on this page and, if the changes are significant, we will provide a more prominent notice (including, for certain services, email notification of privacy policy changes). We will also keep prior versions of this Privacy Policy in an archive for your review. Application Our Privacy Policy applies to all of the services offered by Titanium Zone and its affiliates, but excludes services that have separate privacy policies that do not incorporate this Privacy Policy. Our Privacy Policy does not apply to services offered by other companies or individuals, including products or sites that may be displayed to you in search results, sites that may include Titanium Zone, or other sites linked from our services. Our Privacy Policy does not cover the information practices of other companies and organizations who advertise our services, and who may use cookies, pixel tags and other technologies to serve and offer relevant ads. Enforcement We regularly review our compliance with our Privacy Policy. We also adhere to several self-regulatory frameworks. When we receive formal written complaints, we will contact the person who made the complaint to follow up. We work with the appropriate regulatory authorities, including local data protection authorities, to resolve any complaints regarding the transfer of personal data that we cannot resolve with our users directly. Contact Us If you have any questions about our company, this Web site or this privacy policy, please contact us by e-mail at titaniumzona@gmail.com Office address: S-2, First & Second Floor, Market, Green Park, New Delhi, Delhi 110016, India Phone number: +91 98765 43210 E-mail address: titaniumzona@gmail.com
pages.trainer: Titanium Zone – trainers Trainers In the new hall you will meet both familiar coaches and newcomers to our team. You can find detailed information about each coach on his page. The average cost of personal training is $5-10. To sign up for an individual lesson, write or call the selected trainer. Olivia Bennett Phone number: +91 98345 13240 Experience: 5 years Education: NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) Direction of training activity: Weight loss Gain muscle mass Drawing up a training program depending on your goal Consultation and support on nutrition Work with various features (osteochondrosis, myopia, scoliosis, hernias) Price: 5$ Hello! My name is Olivia Bennett, and I am a fitness trainer. I am passionate about fitness and healthy living and my goal is to help others gain confidence in their bodies, improve their health and achieve their fitness goals. With my approach to training, I strive to create a supportive and inspiring environment where each client can feel comfortable and motivated. I believe that fitness is not only a way to get your body in shape, but also a path to better well-being and self-expression. My approach to training focuses on a healthy balance between strength training, cardio and flexibility. I try to vary the workouts to make them interesting and effective for my clients. I am proud to help women become stronger, healthier and more confident. If you are interested in training with me or have any questions, feel free to contact me. Let's reach your fitness goals together! Ethan Johnson Phone number: +91 98345 54333 Experience: 8 years Education: NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) Direction of training activity: Figure correction Nutrition correction General physical preparation Strength training Recovery from musculoskeletal injuries Working with people of different genders, ages and individual characteristics Price: 8$ Hello! My name is Ethan Johnson, and I am a fitness trainer. I am a dedicated advocate for healthy living and an active lifestyle, and my goal is to help other men achieve their fitness goals and become the best version of themselves. With my experience and passion for training, I strive to inspire and motivate my clients towards their fitness goals. My training approach focuses on a combination of strength training, cardio and flexibility to help you achieve maximum results and improve your overall health. I believe that fitness is not only a way to get your body in shape, but also a way to improve your well-being, self-confidence and vitality. My goal is to help you find a balance between physical and psychological well-being. I am proud to help men become stronger, healthier and more confident. If you're ready to start working on yourself and achieving your fitness goals, don't hesitate to contact me. Let's achieve your success together! Liam Anderson Phone number: +91 91235 54438 Experience: 14 years Education: NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) Direction of training activity: Figure correction Nutrition correction General physical preparation Strength training Recovery from musculoskeletal injuries Working with people of different genders, ages and individual characteristics Price: 10$ Hello! My name is Liam Anderson, and I am a fitness trainer. Physical activity and a healthy lifestyle have always played an important role in my life, and now I am ready to share my experience and knowledge with you. My goal is to help you become stronger, healthier and more confident. I believe that through regular training and the right approach to nutrition, we can achieve impressive results together. My approach to training is based on a balanced combination of strength training, cardio and flexibility. I strive to create a customized program for you that meets your goals and needs. In addition, I am ready to help you not only achieve your physical goals, but also overcome internal barriers and problems that may be preventing you from achieving success. Contacts I accept the Privacy Policy Send Office address: S-2, First & Second Floor, Market, Green Park, New Delhi, Delhi 110016, India Phone number: +91 98765 43210 E-mail address: titaniumzona@gmail.com Privacy Policy
